sidebar.p: To RSVP, please click the link below and fill out the form that appears. You can RSVP at any time. You can RSVP multiple times. You can RSVP for yourself and/or for other people. Relax! You cannot break anything or do anything wrong while submitting an RSVP.

ol.li:
For each attendee in your party (including yourself), click the "Add Attendee" button and fill out the appropriate fields
First Name: enter the first name of the attendee
Last Name: enter the last name of the attendee
Child/Adult: select "Child" if the attendee is age 12 or under; otherwise, select "Adult"
To remove an attendee entirely, click the "Remove Attendee" button alow that attendee

ul.li: select "Yes" if you will be attending the most awesome wedding of 2013!
select "No" if you will not be attending

ol.li: Primary contact email address: enter an email address that may be used to contact all of the attendees

Password: enter the password, found in the Christmas card you should have received from Timski and Jamie
if you have lost the password, contact Timski or Jamie to get it
Comments/Requests: enter any comments/requests/questions you may have
Click "Submit RSVP" to submit the form. If any errors occur, this page will reload with the errors displayed in red. If no errors occur, you should be redirected to another page.
